subject: Dear Owner,
body:
Dear Owner,
I am Mr David Lewis, Inspection Unit Manager United Nations
Inspection Agency in Hartsfield Jackson International Airport Atlanta,
Georgia. During our investigation, I discovered An abandoned shipment
through a Diplomat from the United Kingdom which was transferred from
JF Kennedy Airport to our facility here in Atlanta.
The two consignment boxes are worth $10 million. And I assure you that
the consignment is in your name, and you are advised to provide all
details for claim, after custom clearance charges are perfected .
(REPLY TO THIS EMAIL : (
dvidlewis52@gmail.com
)
Best Regards,
Mr. David Lewis
Head Officer-in-Charge

subject: Re:   Dear Owner,
body:
Hello Mr. David Lewis,

Thank you for reaching out and sharing this intriguing information with me. I must say, it's not every day that one hears about abandoned shipments worth millions!

Could you please provide more details about these boxes? What exactly do they contain? And how did my name get associated with them?

Also, could you clarify what you mean by "custom clearance charges are perfected"? How does this process work?

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Tracy
